- Zoned to Vanderburg and Twitchell Elementary and Coronado High Schools - some of the top public Elementary and High Schools in Henderson/Las Vegas
- Gated Community (Gables), private and secure
- 2 bedroom / 2 Bath 2nd Floor (which is top floor) 966 sq ft Condo/Apartment with a nice open floor plan
- Beautiful Pool and Jacuzzi in the common area
- 1 car port included plus plenty of additional guest parking
- Nice newer Carpets throughout and tile in kitchen and bathrooms
- Large Living Room and small Dining Area near kitchen
- Master has bath and separate shower, closet, and additional storage space
- Kitchen has updated cabinets.
All appliances included - Refrigerator, Stove, Dish Washer, Microwave, Washer, Dryer
- Ceiling Fans with Lights in all the rooms and bedrooms
- Separate Laundry Room with Washer/Dryer included
- Open to individual, roommate(s) or family

Vanderburg or Twitchell ES - two of the top Elementary Schools in Nevada
- Middle:
Bob Miller MS
- High: Coronado HS - one of the best public high schools in Henderson/Vegas
